mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num, board_review_comment.id, content, target_nick, ref_group, comment_group, deleted, profile, board_review_comment.regdate FROM board_review_comment INNER JOIN petusers ON board_review_comment.id=petusers.id WHERE ref_group=#{ref_group} ORDER BY comment_group ASC, num ASC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_review_comment (num, id, content, target_nick, ref_group, comment_group, regdate) VALUES(#{num}, #{id}, #{content}, #{target_nick}, #{ref_group}, #{comment_group}, SYSDATE)
